Topic :: Office/Business :: Enterprise :: Business Service Management :: Service Support

name: GMAO tunisia
short_description:
• Manage equipment.

• Manage preventive interventions ( intervention requests ) and curative interventions ( Work Orders ) .
• Prepare a schedule for maintenance by assigning each task to the appropriate technician and estimating the time to complete the task.

• Monitor the activities of staff and traceability of actions conducted in a computerized manner.

• Establish a history for machinery, interventions and Employee movement parts : a history can inform the maintenance department on repetitive failures or parts most commonly used .

• Prepare purchase orders for spare parts with details of safety stock : the presence of spare parts in the AsteelFlash store saves the time required for the purchase of a spare

• Facilitate the analysis of failures and their causes.

• Monitor performance indicators .
